mapper.select: select p.prodId, p.prodName, p.prodPrice, p.prodThumImage, p.prodDetailImage, i.sizeS, i.sizeM, i.sizeL from products p, inventory i where p.prodId = i.prodId
select * from products where prodHiClass = #{prodHiClass} and prodMiClass = #{prodMiClass} and prodLoClass = #{prodLoClass}

select p.prodId, p.prodName, p.prodPrice, p.prodThumImage, p.prodHiClass, p.prodMiClass, p.prodLoClass, c.psize, c.quantity, c.cartDate from products p, cart c where p.prodId = c.prodId order by p.prodId

select p.prodId, p.prodName, p.prodPrice, p.prodThumImage, p.prodHiClass, p.prodMiClass, p.prodLoClass, c.psize, c.quantity, c.cartDate from products p, cart c where p.prodId = c.prodId order by p.prodId desc

select p.prodId, p.prodName, p.prodPrice, p.prodThumImage, p.prodHiClass, p.prodMiClass, p.prodLoClass, c.psize, c.quantity, c.cartDate from products p, cart c where p.prodId = c.prodId order by p.prodPrice desc

select p.prodId, p.prodName, p.prodPrice, p.prodThumImage, p.prodHiClass, p.prodMiClass, p.prodLoClass, c.psize, c.quantity, c.cartDate from products p, cart c where p.prodId = c.prodId order by p.prodPrice
